name: Game of Life GDX
tagline: Practicing TDD & libGDX by implementing Conway's "Game of Life"
body:
Practicing Test Driven Development & [libGDX](https://libgdx.badlogicgames.com/) by implementing [Conway's "Game of Life"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life)

[Run in browser](http://gpdev.net/demo/game-of-life/)

![Screens](https://gpertzov.github.io/game-of-life/img/GoL_gpdev_net.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
